title: Pajama Sam Complete
description:
Next is the pajama sam series which includes:
No Need To Hide When It's Dark Outside
Thunder and Lightening Aren't So Frightening, 
You Are What You Eat From Your Head to Your Feet
Life is Rough When You Lose Your Stuff, 
one stop fun shop
lost & found, 
sock works

Pajama sam 3 & 4 don't require scummvm they can both launch without it. 3 is optional however.


More Humongous Entertainment:
Putt Putt + Fatty Bear which includes scummvm but is not necessary for the games to work as they are run by one .exe: http://thebootlegbay.com/torrent/10643061/Putt_Putt_Complete___Fatty_Bear_Complete_[Humongous_Entertainmen
